text:
and ConvLSTMs that seek to harness the capabilities of all three model types.
 Hybrid models eﬃciently combine the diverse capabilities of diﬀerent architectures.
Traditionally, a lot of research has been invested into using MLPs for time series forecasting
with modest results (covered in Chapter 10). Perhaps the most promising area in the application
of deep learning methods to time series forecasting are in the use of CNNs, LSTMs and hybrid
